sentences.english: How does a flying squirrel fly without wings?
sentences.chinese: 美洲飛鼠沒有翅膀怎麼飛？

sentences.english: Lake Greenery heavy, rich in moose, black bear, flying squirrels, and Diver.
sentences.chinese: 湖畔綠茵重重，盛產駝鹿，黑熊，飛鼠和潛鳥。

definition: to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
to be neither too familiar nor too distant/to keep sb at arm's length
lit. like a sheet of loose sand/fig. unable to cooperate (idiom)
to have no other choice/to be the last resort
pinyin: bu4 de2 yi3 er2 wei2 zhi1

definition: lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
lit. to directly attack Huanglong/fig. to directly combat the root of a problem
to cleanse oneself/to sanctify oneself/self-cleaning (spark plug, oven etc)
to turn a deaf ear to (idiom); to pretend not to hear
